name: Fire Flora #32
description: I am an Australian artist inspired by the natural world and my surroundings on the south east coast of Australia. Working across the disciplines of painting and digital media, I make art with fire itself, using my work as a vehicle to raise awareness about the ecological perils facing the planet. The images in this collection were made in the wake of the 2019/20 Australian bushfires. After burning a series of timber panels with a blow torch and pyrography tools, I photograph the work and create the digital images. Ghostly, computer-generated floral motives float above a charred and abraded landscape, foreshadowing the disappearance of human civilization on Earth.
